metadata.title: CVE-2024-45409 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The Ruby SAML library is for implementing the client side of a SAMLauthorization. Ruby-SAML in <= 12.2 and 1.13.0 <= 1.16.0 does not properlyverify the signature of the SAML Response. An unauthenticated attacker withaccess to any signed saml document (by the IdP) can thus forge a SAMLResponse/Assertion with arbitrary contents. This would allow the attackerto log in as arbitrary user within the vulnerable system. Thisvulnerability is fixed in 1.17.0 and 1.12.3.

criterions.comment: ruby-saml package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
